translation: 'Moves the camera when the cursor is at the edge of the screen.'

'Allows the camera to fly freely around your park. Useful in tight areas or for taking screenshots.<newline><newline>You can use [{#LogicalButton.GameCamera_FreelookMode#}] to toggle Freelook from within the game.<newline><newline>[{#LogicalButton.GameCamera_RotateLeft#}] and [{#LogicalButton.GameCamera_RotateRight#}] will raise and lower the camera height in Freelook.'
'Inverts Y axis in Freelook and first person ride cameras.'
'Allows the camera to focus on objects like scenery and buildings in addition to terrain and paths.  Focusing on scenery affects camera speed and zoom limitations.'
'This preset uses Centre Focused options and is most similar to strategy and management games. It works best in flat parks.<newline><newline>Default setting.'
'This preset uses Mouse Focused options. It works best in parks with complex terrain.'
'This preset uses a mix of options. It offers precise control but requires careful handling.'
'Grabs a point in the park and move around that.'
'Pans the camera based only on the mouse movement.'
'Grabs a point in the park and moves
column4: and zooms around the grab point.'

translation: 'Determine where the camera moves as you zoom in and out.'
